snippet: Health officials will try to get polio vaccines to more than 20 million children across the Middle East.
abstract: World Health Organization and Unicef say that they are trying to get polio vaccines to more than 20 million children across the Middle East to contain a major outbreak there.
lead_paragraph: Health officials will try to get polio vaccines to more than 20 million children across the Middle East.

headline.main: 20 Million in Mideast to Get Polio Vaccine
headline.print_headline: Prevention: 20 Million in Mideast To Get Polio Vaccine
